abstracts.cdata!:
The development objective of the
            Provincial and Rural Infrastructure Project is to assist the
            Kingdom of Cambodia to enhance the livelihood of the peoples
            residing in the provinces of Kampong Thom, Oddar Meanchey,
            Preah Vihear, and Siem Reap by providing sustainable access
            to markets and essential services through: (i) a program of
            road rehabilitation and maintenance; (ii) a program of
            capacity building and training; and (iii) development of
            improved public policies and strategies. The changes
            concern: (i) a revision of certain monitoring indicators in
            the results framework; (ii) a reallocation of the credit
            proceeds; and (iii) a 12 month extension of the credit
            closing date from December 31, 2010 to December 31, 2011.
            The changes are critical to enable the project to complete
            ongoing activities which will enhance the standard of living
            of local communities in the project areas by improving road
            access to socioeconomic services.
